name: Monkey D. Luffy
description: The captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and the son of the Revolutionary Dragon. He ate the Gum-Gum Fruit, becoming a rubber man. His dream is to find the One Piece and become the King of the Pirates.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

fruit.name: Gum-Gum Fruit
fruit.description: Grants rubber-like properties to the user's body.

name: Roronoa Zoro
description: A master swordsman and the first member to join the Straw Hat Pirates. He practices the Three Sword Style (Santoryu) and aims to defeat Dracule Mihawk to become the World's Greatest Swordsman.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Nami
description: The navigator of the Straw Hat Pirates and a former thief specializing in robbing pirates. She is an expert in meteorology and cartography, dreaming of drawing a map of the entire world.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Usopp
description: The sniper of the Straw Hat Pirates and a talented liar. Son of Yasopp, he dreams of becoming a 'Brave Warrior of the Sea' like the giants of Elbaf.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Vinsmoke Sanji
description: The cook of the Straw Hat Pirates and a former prince of the Germa Kingdom. A master of the Black Leg style who refuses to use his hands in combat. His dream is to find the All Blue.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Tony Tony Chopper
description: The doctor of the Straw Hat Pirates. He is a reindeer that ate the Human-Human Fruit, giving him human intelligence and transformation abilities. He dreams of becoming a doctor who can cure any disease.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

fruit.name: Human-Human Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform into a human hybrid or a full human at will.

name: Nico Robin
description: The archaeologist of the Straw Hat Pirates and the sole survivor of Ohara. She is the only person alive who can read Poneglyphs, making her key to finding the One Piece.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

fruit.name: Flower-Flower Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to sprout pieces of their body from the surface of any object or living thing.

name: Franky
description: The shipwright of the Straw Hat Pirates and a cyborg. He built the Thousand Sunny and dreams of creating a ship capable of circumnavigating the world.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Brook
description: The musician of the Straw Hat Pirates. He is a living skeleton who returned to life thanks to the Revive-Revive Fruit. He wishes to reunite with the whale Laboon.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

fruit.name: Revive-Revive Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to bring their soul back to their body after death, and manipulate their soul.

name: Jinbe
description: The helmsman of the Straw Hat Pirates and a former Warlord of the Sea. A master of Fish-Man Karate, he dreams of true equality between humans and Fish-Men.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Zeus
description: A thundercloud homie originally created by Big Mom using her own soul. He is now Nami's loyal partner and resides within her Clima-Tact.

crew.name: Straw Hat Pirates
crew.description: A powerful and infamous pirate crew originating from East Blue, led by Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Cavendish
description: The captain of the Beautiful Pirates and the 1st ship captain of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He suffers from a split personality disorder, becoming the bloodthirsty Hakuba when he sleeps.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Suleiman
description: A former war criminal known as 'Suleiman the Beheader'. He joined the Beautiful Pirates and is a member of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Bartolomeo
description: Captain of the Barto Club and the 2nd ship captain of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is a massive fan of the Straw Hat Pirates and uses the Barrier-Barrier Fruit.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

fruit.name: Barrier-Barrier Fruit
fruit.description: Enables its user to generate almost invisible barriers to deflect or block any attack.

name: Gambia
description: A staff officer of the Barto Club known as 'The Missionary'. He fights using a nunchaku.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Sai
description: The 13th leader of the Happo Navy and the 3rd ship captain of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He uses the Hasshoken martial art style.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Boo
description: The vice-leader of the Happo Navy and Sai's brother. He fights using axes imbued with Hasshoken.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Baby 5
description: A former assassin for the Donquixote Family who married Sai. She ate the Arms-Arms Fruit and can transform her body into any weapon.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

fruit.name: Arms-Arms Fruit
fruit.description: Enables the user to transform body parts into weapons of all kinds (revolver, cannon, saber, missile).

name: Ideo
description: A martial artist from the Longarm Tribe and captain of the Ideo Pirates (4th ship of the Grand Fleet). Known as 'The Destruction Cannon'.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Blue Gilly
description: A martial artist from the Longleg Tribe who joined the Ideo Pirates. He specializes in the Jao Kun Do fighting style.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Abdullah
description: A former bounty hunter who joined the Ideo Pirates. He fights using spears and dirty tactics alongside his partner Jeet.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Jeet
description: A former bounty hunter who joined the Ideo Pirates. He fights using dual swords alongside his partner Abdullah.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Leo
description: A dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom and captain of the Tontatta Pirates (5th ship of the Grand Fleet). He uses the Stitch-Stitch Fruit.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

fruit.name: Stitch-Stitch Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to sew and unstitch anything on flat surfaces.

name: Kabu
description: A dwarf of the Tontatta Tribe and the Yellow Kabu Squad Leader. He ate a Zoan fruit that turns him into a Rhinoceros Beetle.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

fruit.name: Bug-Bug Fruit, Model: Rhinoceros Beetle
fruit.description: Whoever eats it can transform into a rhinoceros beetle. It enables the user to fly.
fruit.roman_name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Kabutomushi

name: Bian
description: A dwarf of the Tontatta Tribe and the Pink Bee Squad Leader. She ate a Zoan fruit that turns her into a Hornet.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

fruit.name: Bug-Bug Fruit, Model: Hornet
fruit.description: Whoever eats it can turn into a wasp/hornet. It enables the user to fly.
fruit.roman_name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Suzumebachi

name: Hajrudin
description: A giant warrior from Elbaf and captain of the New Giant Warrior Pirates (6th ship of the Grand Fleet). He dreams of reviving the glory of the Giant Warrior Pirates.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Stansen
description: A giant from Elbaf and the shipwright of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. He was formerly imprisoned at the Human Auction House.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Road
description: A giant from Elbaf and the navigator of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. He is usually seen with a large snake.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Goldberg
description: A giant from Elbaf and the cook of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. He carries a large shield and mace.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Gerd
description: A female giant from Elbaf and the doctor of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. She wields a massive battle axe.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Orlumbus
description: An admiral commanding the Yonta Maria Grand Fleet and the 7th ship captain of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is known for his strict discipline.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy after the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Buggy the Clown
description: One of the Four Emperors and leader of the Cross Guild. He was an apprentice on Roger's ship alongside Shanks and is famous for his incredible luck.

crew.name: Cross Guild
crew.description: A powerful organization that issues bounties on Marines, led by Buggy, Crocodile, and Mihawk.

fruit.name: Chop-Chop Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to separate their body into several parts and levitate them independently.

name: Alvida
description: Known as 'Iron Mace' Alvida, she is a pirate captain allied with Buggy. After eating the Slip-Slip Fruit, she became incredibly beautiful and slippery.

crew.name: Cross Guild
crew.description: A powerful organization that issues bounties on Marines, led by Buggy, Crocodile, and Mihawk.

fruit.name: Slip-Slip Fruit
fruit.description: Smoothes the user's skin, making it slippery and deflecting objects that touch the body.

name: Galdino (Mr. 3)
description: A former Baroque Works officer who joined Buggy. He is a tactician who can create objects out of wax.

crew.name: Cross Guild
crew.description: A powerful organization that issues bounties on Marines, led by Buggy, Crocodile, and Mihawk.

fruit.name: Wax-Wax Fruit
fruit.description: Produces a fast-hardening wax that can be molded into any shape.

name: Mohji
description: The first mate of the Buggy Pirates and a beast tamer. He is rarely seen without his giant pet lion, Richie.

crew.name: Cross Guild
crew.description: A powerful organization that issues bounties on Marines, led by Buggy, Crocodile, and Mihawk.

name: Cabaji
description: The chief of staff of the Buggy Pirates. He is an acrobat swordsman who uses unicycles and spinning tops in combat.

crew.name: Cross Guild
crew.description: A powerful organization that issues bounties on Marines, led by Buggy, Crocodile, and Mihawk.

name: Kuro
description: The captain of the Black Cat Pirates, known for his high intellect and speed. He uses 'Cat Claws' as weapons and faked his death to live peacefully.

crew.name: East Blue Villains
crew.description: Notable pirates who operated in the East Blue.

name: Sham
description: One of the Nyaban Brothers of the Black Cat Pirates. He fights cooperatively with Buchi and pretends to be weak to lower opponents' guard.

crew.name: East Blue Villains
crew.description: Notable pirates who operated in the East Blue.

name: Buchi
description: One of the Nyaban Brothers of the Black Cat Pirates. He is the stronger and larger of the duo, using his weight to crush enemies.

crew.name: East Blue Villains
crew.description: Notable pirates who operated in the East Blue.

name: Don Krieg
description: The Admiral of the Krieg Pirates and the most feared pirate in East Blue before entering the Grand Line. He relies on massive weaponry and armor.

crew.name: East Blue Villains
crew.description: Notable pirates who operated in the East Blue.

name: Gin
description: The Combat Commander of the Krieg Pirates and Don Krieg's right-hand man. He fights using tonfas and has a strong sense of loyalty.

crew.name: East Blue Villains
crew.description: Notable pirates who operated in the East Blue.

name: Pearl
description: A commander of the Krieg Pirates known as 'Iron Wall Pearl'. He wears large shields on his body and can ignite them with fire.

crew.name: East Blue Villains
crew.description: Notable pirates who operated in the East Blue.

name: Mont Blanc Cricket
description: A descendant of Mont Blanc Noland living on Jaya. He spent years diving for the City of Gold to clear his ancestor's name.

crew.name: Saruyama Alliance
crew.description: An alliance formed to search for the Sky Island and the City of Gold.

name: Masira
description: The Salvage King and leader of the Masira Pirates. He is a human who looks remarkably like a monkey and is allied with Cricket.

crew.name: Saruyama Alliance
crew.description: An alliance formed to search for the Sky Island and the City of Gold.

name: Shoujou
description: The Sonar King and leader of the Shoujou Pirates. Like his brother Masira, he resembles a monkey and uses his voice as a sonar.

crew.name: Saruyama Alliance
crew.description: An alliance formed to search for the Sky Island and the City of Gold.

name: Foxy
description: The captain of the Foxy Pirates, known as the 'Silver Fox'. He is a master of the Davy Back Fight and uses the Slow-Slow Fruit to cheat.

crew.name: Foxy Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew specializing in Davy Back Fights to steal crewmates from other pirates.

fruit.name: Slow-Slow Fruit
fruit.description: Emits 'Noro Noro' beams that slow down the movement of any object or person for 30 seconds.

name: Porche
description: The idol of the Foxy Pirates and Foxy's loyal subordinate. She fights using batons and shurikens hidden as flowers.

crew.name: Foxy Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew specializing in Davy Back Fights.

name: Hamburg
description: A member of the Foxy Pirates and leader of the Groggy Monsters. He is very fast despite his size and fights as a team.

crew.name: Foxy Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew specializing in Davy Back Fights.

name: Gecko Moria
description: A former Warlord of the Sea and captain of the Thriller Bark Pirates. He steals shadows to create zombie armies.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

fruit.name: Shadow-Shadow Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to manifest and control shadows as physical beings. They can steal shadows to create zombies.

name: Dr. Hogback
description: A genius surgeon and member of the Thriller Bark Pirates. He constructs the bodies for Moria's zombies.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Absalom
description: A Commander of the Zombie Soldiers and one of the Mysterious Four of Thriller Bark. He was a perverted man who used the Clear-Clear Fruit to turn invisible. He was later killed by the Blackbeard Pirates.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

fruit.name: Clear-Clear Fruit
fruit.description: Enables the user to make himself and everything he touches invisible.

name: Perona
description: The Ghost Princess and Commander of the Wild Zombies. She uses ghosts to drain the will of her enemies. After Thriller Bark, she resided on Kuraigana Island with Mihawk.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

fruit.name: Hollow-Hollow Fruit
fruit.description: Allows its user to create ghosts with various abilities, such as undermining morale.

name: Charlotte Lola
description: The captain of the Rolling Pirates and a daughter of Big Mom who ran away to find true love. She is the twin sister of Chiffon and proposed to over 4,000 men.

crew.name: Rolling Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew led by Charlotte Lola, victims of Gecko Moria's shadow theft.

name: Trafalgar D. Water Law
description: The 'Surgeon of Death', captain of the Heart Pirates, and a former Warlord. He aims to uncover the history of the Will of D. and wields the Op-Op Fruit.

crew.name: Heart Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew from North Blue led by Trafalgar Law, known for their submarine, the Polar Tang.

fruit.name: Op-Op Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create a spherical space or 'room' where they have complete control over objects.

name: Bepo
description: A polar bear Mink and the navigator of the Heart Pirates. He is a martial artist who knows Suluong form but has a very fragile ego.

crew.name: Heart Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew from North Blue led by Trafalgar Law.

name: Jean Bart
description: A former pirate captain who was enslaved by Celestial Dragons. Law freed him on Sabaody, and he serves as a loyal powerhouse for the crew.

crew.name: Heart Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew from North Blue led by Trafalgar Law.

name: Shachi
description: A member of the Heart Pirates who wears an orca hat. He was a bully in North Blue before meeting Law and Bepo.

crew.name: Heart Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew from North Blue led by Trafalgar Law.

name: Penguin
description: A member of the Heart Pirates who wears a hat with 'PENGUIN' written on it. He fights using a spear and is skilled in underwater combat.

crew.name: Heart Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew from North Blue led by Trafalgar Law.

name: Eustass Kid
description: The captain of the Kid Pirates and a member of the Worst Generation. He is aggressive and wields the Magnet-Magnet Fruit. He helped defeat Big Mom.

crew.name: Kid Pirates
crew.description: A notorious pirate crew from South Blue known for causing huge civilian casualties.

fruit.name: Magnet-Magnet Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to manipulate magnetic forces to attract or repel metal objects.

name: Killer
description: The first mate of the Kid Pirates and a member of the Worst Generation. Known as the 'Massacre Soldier', he uses rotating scythes called 'Punishers'.

crew.name: Kid Pirates
crew.description: A notorious pirate crew from South Blue led by Eustass Kid.

name: Heat
description: A crew member of the Kid Pirates who has a zombie-like appearance. He can breathe fire from his mouth.

crew.name: Kid Pirates
crew.description: A notorious pirate crew from South Blue led by Eustass Kid.

name: Wire
description: A crew member of the Kid Pirates who dresses in gothic attire. He fights using a trident.

crew.name: Kid Pirates
crew.description: A notorious pirate crew from South Blue led by Eustass Kid.

name: Capone Bege
description: The captain of the Fire Tank Pirates and a former mafia don. He is a 'Castle Human' who can house his entire crew and weapons inside his body.

crew.name: Fire Tank Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew styled like a mafia family, led by Capone 'Gang' Bege.

fruit.name: Castle-Castle Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to become a living fortress, housing troops and weapons inside their body.

name: Vito
description: The advisor of the Fire Tank Pirates, known as 'Monster Gun'. He has huge hands and is a massive fan of the Germa 66 comic strips.

crew.name: Fire Tank Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew styled like a mafia family.

name: Gotti
description: An assassin for the Fire Tank Pirates. He has a cybernetic machine gun arm and is fiercely loyal to Bege and Chiffon.

crew.name: Fire Tank Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew styled like a mafia family.

name: Charlotte Chiffon
description: The wife of Capone Bege and daughter of Big Mom. She looks exactly like her twin sister Lola and is an expert at baking chiffon cakes.

crew.name: Fire Tank Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew styled like a mafia family.

name: Capone Pez
description: The infant son of Capone Bege and Chiffon. He has his father's demeanor and is cherished by the crew.

crew.name: Fire Tank Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew styled like a mafia family.

name: Jewelry Bonney
description: The captain of the Bonney Pirates and daughter of Kuma. She can manipulate the age of herself and others using the Age-Age Fruit.

crew.name: Bonney Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew led by 'Big Eater' Jewelry Bonney from South Blue.

fruit.name: Age-Age Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to manipulate the age of themselves and others at will.

name: Urouge
description: The captain of the Fallen Monk Pirates, hailing from a Sky Island. Known as 'Mad Monk', he can convert damage taken into physical strength.

crew.name: Fallen Monk Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew from a Sky Island led by 'Mad Monk' Urouge.

fruit.name: Unknown Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to convert damage taken into physical strength and size.

name: Boa Hancock
description: The Pirate Empress and captain of the Kuja Pirates. Considered the most beautiful woman in the world, she wields the Love-Love Fruit and is secretly in love with Luffy.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily, led by the Pirate Empress Boa Hancock.

fruit.name: Love-Love Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to petrify anyone who feels lust or attraction towards them.

name: Boa Sandersonia
description: The second Gorgon Sister and a commander of the Kuja Pirates. She can transform into an Anaconda and has a 'snake-stare' ability.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

fruit.name: Snake-Snake Fruit, Model: Anaconda
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform into an anaconda or hybrid form.
fruit.roman_name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda

name: Boa Marigold
description: The youngest Gorgon Sister and a commander of the Kuja Pirates. She can transform into a King Cobra and spit deadly poison.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

fruit.name: Snake-Snake Fruit, Model: King Cobra
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform into a King Cobra or hybrid form.
fruit.roman_name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra

name: Marguerite
description: A warrior of the Kuja Tribe who befriended Luffy. She is skilled with Haki-imbued arrows and sewing.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

name: Shiki
description: Known as the 'Golden Lion', he was a legendary rival of Roger. He was the first person to escape Impel Down and controls gravity with the Float-Float Fruit.

crew.name: Golden Lion Pirates
crew.description: A legendary pirate fleet led by Shiki the Golden Lion, rival to Gol D. Roger.

fruit.name: Float-Float Fruit
fruit.description: Enables the user to levitate themselves and non-living objects they touch.

name: Dr. Indigo
description: A doctor and chemist for the Golden Lion Pirates. He fights using 'Chemical Juggling' and communicates through mime-like gestures.

crew.name: Golden Lion Pirates
crew.description: A legendary pirate fleet led by Shiki the Golden Lion.

name: Caribou
description: A rookie pirate known as 'Wet-Haired Caribou'. He is a creep who kidnaps mermaids and has a swamp body that can store stolen goods.

crew.name: Caribou Pirates
crew.description: A cruel pirate crew known for killing marines, led by brothers Caribou and Coribou.

fruit.name: Swamp-Swamp Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to become a living swamp, creating bottomless pockets to store weapons or trap enemies.

name: Coribou
description: The younger brother of Caribou and co-captain of their crew. He is dim-witted, carries a shovel, and is extremely loyal to his brother.

crew.name: Caribou Pirates
crew.description: A cruel pirate crew known for killing marines.

name: Fisher Tiger
description: A legendary Fish-Man adventurer and founder of the Sun Pirates. He famously climbed the Red Line to free slaves from Mariejois.

crew.name: Sun Pirates
crew.description: A legendary crew formed by Fisher Tiger to free slaves and protect Fish-Men.

name: Aladine
description: A merman doctor and former slave who became the captain of the Sun Pirates after Jimbei. He is married to Charlotte Praline.

crew.name: Sun Pirates
crew.description: A legendary crew formed by Fisher Tiger to free slaves and protect Fish-Men.

name: Charlotte Praline
description: A hammerhead shark mermaid and daughter of Big Mom. She married Aladine and is fiercely loyal to her husband over her mother, using her singing to charm sea slugs.

crew.name: Sun Pirates
crew.description: A legendary crew formed by Fisher Tiger to free slaves and protect Fish-Men.

name: Dracule Mihawk
description: The World's Strongest Swordsman and a former Warlord. He wields the black blade Yoru and is a founding member of the Cross Guild.

crew.name: Cross Guild
crew.description: An organization that issues bounties on Marines.

name: Crocodile
description: A former Warlord and leader of Baroque Works who controls sand. He co-founded the Cross Guild with Mihawk and Buggy.

crew.name: Cross Guild
crew.description: An organization that issues bounties on Marines.

fruit.name: Sand-Sand Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into sand.

name: Daz Bones (Mr. 1)
description: A former Baroque Works agent and Crocodile's loyal subordinate. He can turn his body into steel blades.

crew.name: Cross Guild
crew.description: An organization that issues bounties on Marines.

fruit.name: Dice-Dice Fruit
fruit.description: Turns the user's body into living steel blades.

name: Edward Weevil
description: A former Warlord who claims to be the biological son of Whitebeard. He possesses immense physical strength but has the mind of a child.

name: Shanks
description: One of the Four Emperors and captain of the Red Hair Pirates. He is a master of Haki who inspired Luffy to become a pirate.

crew.name: Red Hair Pirates
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew ruling over the New World, led by Red-Haired Shanks.

name: Benn Beckman
description: The Vice Captain of the Red Hair Pirates. He is highly intelligent and strikes fear into enemies with just his rifle and presence.

crew.name: Red Hair Pirates
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew ruling over the New World, led by Red-Haired Shanks.

name: Lucky Roux
description: A combatant of the Red Hair Pirates. Despite his round size and constant eating, he is incredibly fast and agile.

crew.name: Red Hair Pirates
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew ruling over the New World, led by Red-Haired Shanks.

name: Yasopp
description: The sniper of the Red Hair Pirates and Usopp's father. He is a world-class marksman who can shoot the antennae off an ant.

crew.name: Red Hair Pirates
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew ruling over the New World, led by Red-Haired Shanks.

name: Limejuice
description: An officer of the Red Hair Pirates. He wields an electrified baton and fights with aerial techniques.

crew.name: Red Hair Pirates
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew ruling over the New World, led by Red-Haired Shanks.

name: Bonk Punch
description: An officer of the Red Hair Pirates who fights alongside his monkey, Monster. He is a powerful brawler.

crew.name: Red Hair Pirates
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew ruling over the New World, led by Red-Haired Shanks.

name: Monster
description: A monkey who is an executive officer of the Red Hair Pirates. He assists Bonk Punch in battle.

crew.name: Red Hair Pirates
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew ruling over the New World, led by Red-Haired Shanks.

name: Building Snake

crew.name: Fake Straw Hat Crew

crew.name: Fake Straw Hat Crew
crew.description: A group of impostors led by Demaro Black who impersonated Luffy's crew.

name: Dosun

crew.name: New Fish-Man Pirates
crew.description: A crew of Fish-Men extremists who idolize Arlong and seek to destroy Fish-Man Island.

name: Zeo

crew.name: New Fish-Man Pirates
crew.description: A crew of Fish-Men extremists who idolize Arlong and seek to destroy Fish-Man Island.

name: Daruma

crew.name: New Fish-Man Pirates
crew.description: A crew of Fish-Men extremists who idolize Arlong and seek to destroy Fish-Man Island.

crew.name: New Fish-Man Pirates
crew.description: A crew of Fish-Men extremists who idolize Arlong and seek to destroy Fish-Man Island.

crew.name: New Fish-Man Pirates
crew.description: A crew of Fish-Men extremists who idolize Arlong and seek to destroy Fish-Man Island.

name: Vander Decken IX
description: The captain of the Flying Pirates. He stalked Princess Shirahoshi for years using his Mark-Mark Fruit abilities to throw weapons at her.

crew.name: Flying Pirates
crew.description: A crew sailing on the legendary Flying Dutchman, capable of underwater travel.

fruit.name: Mark-Mark Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to lock onto a target by touching them, then throw objects that will unerringly home in on that target.

name: Donquixote Doflamingo
description: The captain of the Donquixote Pirates and former King of Dressrosa. Known as 'Heavenly Yaksha', he is a former Celestial Dragon and Warlord who controls the underworld.

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld, led by Doflamingo.

fruit.name: String-String Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create and manipulate strings to cut, control people, and fly by attaching strings to clouds.

name: Trebol
description: One of the three top executives of the Donquixote Pirates. He is the Staff Officer, a sticky, mucus-covered man who raised Doflamingo.

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

fruit.name: Stick-Stick Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create and control sticky, flammable mucus.

name: Diamante
description: One of the three top executives of the Donquixote Pirates and hero of the Coliseum. He runs the Fighting Division and can make anything flat and rippling.

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

fruit.name: Ripple-Ripple Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to make any object flat and rippling like a flag, while retaining its original properties.

name: Pica
description: One of the three top executives of the Donquixote Pirates. He has a high-pitched voice and can merge with stone to become a giant golem.

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

fruit.name: Stone-Stone Fruit
fruit.description: Allows its holder to merge with and manipulate stone.

name: Vergo

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

name: Sugar

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

fruit.name: Hobby-Hobby Fruit
fruit.description: Transforms any person into a toy by touch and erases all memory of their existence from others.

name: Jora
description: An officer of the Trebol Army. She is an eccentric artist who can transform anything into abstract art, rendering it useless.

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

fruit.name: Art-Art Fruit
fruit.description: Enables the user to transform everything they touch into a work of art.

name: Lao G
description: An officer of the Diamante Army. He is an elderly martial artist who uses the 'Jio-Ken' style, gaining power as he ages.

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

name: Senor Pink

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

fruit.name: Swim-Swim Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to swim through solid surfaces such as walls or the ground.

name: Machvise
description: An officer of the Diamante Army. He carries a heavy shield and can manipulate his weight to crush enemies.

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

fruit.name: Ton-Ton Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to increase their body weight by metric tons.

name: Dellinger

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

name: Gladius
description: An officer of the Pica Army. He can make his body and inanimate objects swell and explode.

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

fruit.name: Pop-Pop Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to inflate and rupture their body or inorganic objects, causing explosions.

name: Buffalo
description: An officer of the Pica Army. He can spin parts of his body like propellers to fly and create powerful winds.

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

fruit.name: Spin-Spin Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to make every part of his body rotate like a propeller.

name: Monet

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

fruit.name: Snow-Snow Fruit
fruit.description: The body of the eater turns to snow. It can create violent blizzards and solid snow barriers.

name: Rocks D. Xebec

crew.name: Rocks Pirates
crew.description: A legendary crew of monsters that existed 40 years ago, including future Emperors like Kaido and Big Mom.

name: Im
description: The mysterious ruler of the world who sits on the Empty Throne. Their existence is kept secret from the public, and they hold supreme authority.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

name: Saint Jaygarcia Saturn
description: One of the Five Elders, holding the title of Warrior God of Science and Defense. He possesses a demonic, spider-like transformation.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The highest authority of the World Government.

name: Saint Marcus Mars
description: One of the Five Elders, holding the title of Warrior God of Environment. He can transform into a giant bird-like creature (Itsumade).

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The highest authority of the World Government.

name: Saint Topman Warcury
description: One of the Five Elders, holding the title of Warrior God of Justice. He transforms into a boar-like creature (Fengxi) with immense durability.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The highest authority of the World Government.

name: Saint Ethanbaron V. Nusjuro
description: One of the Five Elders, holding the title of Warrior God of Finance. He wields a sword and transforms into a skeletal horse (Bakotsu).

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The highest authority of the World Government.

name: Saint Shepherd Ju Peter
description: One of the Five Elders, holding the title of Warrior God of Agriculture. He transforms into a giant worm-like creature (Sandworm).

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The highest authority of the World Government.

name: Saint Rosward
description: A Celestial Dragon and the father of Charloss and Shalria. He is arrogant and uses slaves as mounts, considering himself a god.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The aristocratic descendants of the founders of the World Government.

name: Saint Charloss
description: A Celestial Dragon known for his extreme cruelty and stupidity. He was punched by Luffy at Sabaody and later attacked Shirahoshi at the Reverie.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The aristocratic descendants of the founders of the World Government.

name: Saint Shalria
description: A Celestial Dragon and the daughter of Rosward. She is just as cruel as her brother and treats commoners with utter contempt.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The aristocratic descendants of the founders of the World Government.

name: Saint Donquixote Mjosgard
description: A Celestial Dragon who was reformed by Queen Otohime's kindness. He saved Shirahoshi during the Reverie but was executed for aiding pirates.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The aristocratic descendants of the founders of the World Government.

name: Saint Jalmack
description: A Celestial Dragon who visited the Goa Kingdom. He ruthlessly shot Sabo's boat simply because it crossed his path.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The aristocratic descendants of the founders of the World Government.

name: Guernica
description: A masked agent of CP0. He was present during the Wano raid and interfered in the fight between Luffy and Kaido on orders from the Elders.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Rob Lucci
description: A masked agent of CP0 and former leader of CP9. He believes in 'Dark Justice' and is a user of the Awakened Cat-Cat Fruit, Model: Leopard.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

fruit.name: Cat-Cat Fruit, Model: Leopard
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform into a leopard or hybrid form.
fruit.roman_name: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard

name: Hattori
description: Rob Lucci's pet pigeon. He is always with Lucci, often wearing matching clothes and mimicking his owner's movements.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Spandam
description: A member of CP0 and former chief of CP9. He is cowardly, weak, and relies on his father's influence and his sword, Funkfreed.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Funkfreed
description: Spandam's sword which 'ate' the Elephant-Elephant Fruit. It can transform into an elephant or a sword-elephant hybrid to attack.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

fruit.name: Elephant-Elephant Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the object to transform into an elephant.

name: Kaku
description: A masked agent of CP0 and former CP9 member. He is a master swordsman who uses the Four-Sword Style and has an Awakened Giraffe Zoan form.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

fruit.name: Ox-Ox Fruit, Model: Giraffe
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform into a giraffe or hybrid form.
fruit.roman_name: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe

name: Stussy
description: A masked agent of CP0 and a clone of Buckingham Stussy (former Rocks Pirate). She infiltrated the underworld as a queen of the pleasure district.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Maha
description: A masked agent of CP0. He accompanied Guernica to Wano and fought against Izo.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Jerry
description: A member of CP6 from Karate Island. He is extremely tall and uses his limbs for 'Yoga Boxing', but was defeated by Sanji on the Sea Train.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Wanze
description: A member of CP7 and a chef. He uses 'Ramen Kenpo', fighting with noodles he produces from his nose, and was defeated by Sanji.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Baskerville (Bas)
description: One of the three heads of the presiding judge at Enies Lobby. He represents the 'left' head of the three-headed judge persona.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The judicial branch of the World Government.

name: Baskerville (And)
description: One of the three heads of the presiding judge at Enies Lobby. He represents the 'middle' head.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The judicial branch of the World Government.

name: Baskerville (Kerville)
description: One of the three heads of the presiding judge at Enies Lobby. He represents the 'right' head.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The judicial branch of the World Government.

name: Hannyabal

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: Staff of the Impel Down prison.

name: Magellan
description: The Vice Warden (formerly Warden) of Impel Down. He eats the Venom-Venom Fruit and is terrifyingly powerful, though he spends much time in the bathroom.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: Staff of the Impel Down prison.

fruit.name: Venom-Venom Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to generate and control various types of poison.

name: Domino

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: Staff of the Impel Down prison.

name: Saldeath
description: The Chief Guard of Impel Down who commands the Blugori using a flute. Despite his small stature, he is a capable commander.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: Staff of the Impel Down prison.

name: Sadi
description: The Chief of the Jailer Beasts in Impel Down. She is a sadist who enjoys hearing the screams of prisoners and wields a whip.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: Staff of the Impel Down prison.

name: Minotaurus
description: One of the Jailer Beasts of Impel Down. He is an Awakened Zoan user (cow model) with immense durability and wields a spiked club.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: Staff of the Impel Down prison.

name: Minokoala
description: One of the Jailer Beasts of Impel Down. He is an Awakened Zoan user (koala model) who fights with martial arts.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: Staff of the Impel Down prison.

name: Minorhinoceros
description: One of the Jailer Beasts of Impel Down. He is an Awakened Zoan user (rhinoceros model) who uses spiked maces.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: Staff of the Impel Down prison.

name: Minozebra
description: One of the Jailer Beasts of Impel Down. He is an Awakened Zoan user (zebra model) with a spiked flail.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: Staff of the Impel Down prison.

name: Minochihuahua
description: One of the new Jailer Beasts introduced after the timeskip. An Awakened Zoan user (chihuahua model).

crew.description: A secret criminal syndicate led by Crocodile.
