description: A frontier agent of Baroque Works and the partner of Miss Wednesday (Vivi). He fights with two metal bats and performs acrobatics.

crew.name: Baroque Works
crew.description: A secret criminal syndicate led by Crocodile.

name: Miss Monday
description: A frontier agent of Baroque Works and the partner of Mr. 9. She is a bodybuilder with immense physical strength.

crew.name: Baroque Works
crew.description: A secret criminal syndicate led by Crocodile.

name: Gan Fall
description: The former God of Skypiea who was overthrown by Enel. He acts as the 'Knight of the Sky' to help those in need.

crew.name: Skypiea
crew.description: A land in the sky, 10,000 meters above sea level.

name: Pierre
description: Gan Fall's pet bird who ate the Horse-Horse Fruit. He can turn into a pegasus (though not a very graceful one).

crew.name: Skypiea
crew.description: A land in the sky, 10,000 meters above sea level.

fruit.name: Horse-Horse Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the bird to transform into a horse or a pegasus hybrid.

name: Conis
description: A friendly Skypiean citizen who plays the harp. She helped the Straw Hat Pirates navigate the dangers of Skypiea.

crew.name: Skypiea
crew.description: A land in the sky, 10,000 meters above sea level.

name: Pagaya
description: Conis's father. He is a brilliant inventor who created the Weaver that Nami used.

crew.name: Skypiea
crew.description: A land in the sky, 10,000 meters above sea level.

name: Wyper
description: The leader of the Shandian warriors. Known as the 'Berserker', he fights recklessly to reclaim his homeland, Upper Yard, from Enel.

crew.name: Shandora
crew.description: The ancient City of Gold, originally located on Jaya before being knocked into the sky.

name: Kamakiri
description: A Shandian warrior and one of Wyper's trusted allies. He fights using a spear and a Burn Bazooka.

crew.name: Shandora
crew.description: The ancient City of Gold.

name: Braham
description: A Shandian warrior who wields Flash Guns. He fought against Zoro during the survival game.

crew.name: Shandora
crew.description: The ancient City of Gold.

name: Genbo
description: A Shandian warrior who uses a massive iron bazooka. He was defeated by Yama of the Divine Army.

crew.name: Shandora
crew.description: The ancient City of Gold.

name: Raki
description: A female Shandian warrior. She fought bravely during the survival game but was struck down by Enel.

crew.name: Shandora
crew.description: The ancient City of Gold.

name: Aisa
description: A young Shandian girl born with Mantra (Observation Haki). She can sense the voices of everyone on the island.

crew.name: Shandora
crew.description: The ancient City of Gold.

name: Enel
description: The 'God' of Skypiea. He possesses the Rumble-Rumble Fruit, making him a lightning human with god-like destructive power and extensive Mantra.

crew.name: God's Army
crew.description: The army led by Enel that ruled over Skypiea.

fruit.name: Rumble-Rumble Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into electricity.

name: Ohm
description: One of Enel's four priests, handling the 'Ordeal of Iron'. He wields a sword made of Iron Cloud that can change shape.

crew.name: God's Army
crew.description: The army led by Enel.

name: Shura
description: One of Enel's four priests, handling the 'Ordeal of String'. He rides a giant bird named Fuza and uses a heat javelin.

crew.name: God's Army
crew.description: The army led by Enel.

name: Gedatsu
description: One of Enel's four priests, handling the 'Ordeal of Swamp'. He is extremely absent-minded and often forgets to breathe or speak.

crew.name: God's Army
crew.description: The army led by Enel.

name: Satori
description: One of Enel's four priests, handling the 'Ordeal of Spheres'. He fights using impact dials and surprise balls.

crew.name: God's Army
crew.description: The army led by Enel.

name: Yama
description: The Commander of the Divine Soldiers. He is a massive man who fights with brute strength and an Axe Dial sash.

crew.name: God's Army
crew.description: The army led by Enel.

name: Hotori
description: A Lieutenant of the Divine Soldiers and one of Satori's younger brothers. He uses dials to fight.

crew.name: God's Army
crew.description: The army led by Enel.

name: Kotori
description: A Lieutenant of the Divine Soldiers and one of Satori's younger brothers. He fights alongside his twin Hotori.

crew.name: God's Army
crew.description: The army led by Enel.

name: Kalgara
description: The legendary warrior of Shandora who lived 400 years ago. He was the best friend of Mont Blanc Noland.

crew.name: Shandora
crew.description: The ancient City of Gold.

name: Mousse
description: Kalgara's daughter who lived 400 years ago. She was almost sacrificed to the Kashigami snake to stop a plague.

crew.name: Shandora
crew.description: The ancient City of Gold.

name: Seto
description: A young Shandian boy who idolized Kalgara and Noland. He later married Mousse.

crew.name: Shandora
crew.description: The ancient City of Gold.

name: Tonjit
description: An old man living on Long Ring Long Land. He was stuck on stilts for 10 years before Luffy helped him down.

crew.name: Long Ring Long Land
crew.description: An archipelago where everything is unusually long.

name: Shelly
description: Tonjit's beloved horse. She is a 'Long Horse' with an exceptionally long neck and legs.

crew.name: Long Ring Long Land
crew.description: An archipelago where everything is unusually long.

name: Kokoro
description: The stationmaster of Shift Station near Water 7. She is an icefish mermaid who can walk on land and loves to drink.

crew.name: Water 7
crew.description: The city of water and shipwrights.

name: Chimney
description: The granddaughter of Kokoro and a resident of Shift Station. She is a quarter-mermaid, incredibly energetic, and often acts as a guide for the Straw Hats.

crew.name: Water 7
crew.description: The city of water and shipwrights.

name: Gonbe
description: Chimney's pet 'cat', though he is clearly a rabbit. He mimics Chimney's movements and expressions perfectly.

crew.name: Water 7
crew.description: The city of water and shipwrights.

name: Yokozuna
description: A sumo-wrestling frog who challenged the Sea Train Puffing Tom every day to strengthen himself after Tom's arrest.

crew.name: Water 7
crew.description: The city of water and shipwrights.

name: Iceburg
description: The Mayor of Water 7 and president of the Galley-La Company. He was Tom's apprentice alongside Franky and holds the blueprints to Pluton.

crew.name: Galley-La Company
crew.description: The world's best shipbuilding company, located in Water 7.

name: Tyrannosaurus
description: Iceburg's pet mouse. Iceburg found him and decided to keep him, often carrying him in his chest pocket.

crew.name: Galley-La Company
crew.description: The world's best shipbuilding company.

name: Paulie
description: The Vice President of Galley-La Company. He uses heavy ropes as weapons ('Rope Action') and is constantly in debt due to gambling.

crew.name: Galley-La Company
crew.description: The world's best shipbuilding company.

name: Peeply Lulu
description: A foreman of Galley-La Company. He has a prominent cowlick in his hair and usually fights with two swords.

crew.name: Galley-La Company
crew.description: The world's best shipbuilding company.

name: Tilestone
description: A foreman of Galley-La Company. He is a massive man with immense physical strength who shouts everything he says.

crew.name: Galley-La Company
crew.description: The world's best shipbuilding company.

name: Zambai
description: The leader of the Franky Family subordinates. He is loyal to Franky and led the charge to raid Enies Lobby.

crew.name: Franky Family
crew.description: A gang of ship dismantlers and bounty hunters led by Franky.

name: Mozu
description: One of the 'Square Sisters' of the Franky Family. She has a square hairstyle and acts as Franky's sidekick alongside Kiwi.

crew.name: Franky Family
crew.description: A gang of ship dismantlers and bounty hunters led by Franky.

name: Kiwi
description: One of the 'Square Sisters' of the Franky Family. She has a square hairstyle and is Mozu's twin sister.

crew.name: Franky Family
crew.description: A gang of ship dismantlers and bounty hunters led by Franky.

name: Sodom
description: One of the King Bulls ridden by the Franky Family. He has good stamina and helped transport the crew through Enies Lobby.

crew.name: Franky Family
crew.description: A gang of ship dismantlers and bounty hunters led by Franky.

name: Gomorrah
description: One of the King Bulls ridden by the Franky Family. He fought bravely at Enies Lobby despite going blind during the battle.

crew.name: Franky Family
crew.description: A gang of ship dismantlers and bounty hunters led by Franky.

name: Kalifa
description: A CP9 agent who posed as Iceburg's secretary. She ate the Bubble-Bubble Fruit, allowing her to clean power away from her enemies.

crew.name: Cipher Pol
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

fruit.name: Bubble-Bubble Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create and control soap bubbles that can clean anything, including power.

name: Blueno
description: A CP9 agent who posed as a bartender in Water 7. He possesses the Door-Door Fruit, allowing him to create doors in air or walls.

crew.name: Cipher Pol
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

fruit.name: Door-Door Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create doors on any surface, including the air, to travel through dimensions.

name: Jabra
description: A CP9 agent who uses the Wolf-Wolf Fruit. He specializes in 'Tekkai Kenpo' and is very competitive with Lucci.

crew.name: Cipher Pol
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

fruit.name: Dog-Dog Fruit, Model: Wolf
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform into a wolf or hybrid form.
fruit.roman_name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Wolf

name: Kumadori
description: A CP9 agent who acts like a kabuki actor. He practices 'Life Return' to manipulate his hair and body functions.

crew.name: Cipher Pol
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Fukurou
description: A CP9 agent with a zipper for a mouth. He measures the physical power (Douriki) of agents and cannot keep secrets.

crew.name: Cipher Pol
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Nero
description: A new recruit to CP9 known as the 'Weasel'. He only mastered four of the six Rokushiki powers and was defeated by Franky.

crew.name: Cipher Pol
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Spandine
description: The former director of CP9 and Spandam's father. He was responsible for initiating the Buster Call on Ohara.

crew.name: Cipher Pol
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Tom
description: A legendary Fish-Man shipwright who built Gol D. Roger's ship, the Oro Jackson. He taught Franky and Iceburg and built the Sea Train.

crew.name: Tom's Workers
crew.description: The legendary shipbuilding company that created the Sea Train.

name: Clover
description: The director of the Ohara Library and a world-renowned archaeologist. He was executed for studying the Poneglyphs and discovering the Void Century.

crew.name: Ohara Scholars
crew.description: A group of archaeologists who sought the truth of the Void Century.

name: Nico Olvia
description: Nico Robin's mother and an archaeologist from Ohara. She left Robin to pursue the Poneglyphs and died protecting the island's knowledge.

crew.name: Ohara Scholars
crew.description: A group of archaeologists who sought the truth of the Void Century.

name: Jaguar D. Saul
description: A former Marine Vice Admiral and a giant who saved Nico Robin during the Ohara Buster Call. He taught her to laugh in hard times.

crew.name: Ohara Scholars
crew.description: Although a Marine, he defected to protect the scholars of Ohara.

name: Victoria Cindry
description: A famous stage actress who died and was resurrected as a zombie by Dr. Hogback. She served as his servant on Thriller Bark.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Hildon
description: A zombie messenger of Thriller Bark. He has bat wings and often transports guests or delivers messages for Moria.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Kumacy
description: Perona's favorite zombie servant. He is a patchwork bear who is often told to shut up because his voice isn't cute enough.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Inuppe
description: A penguin-dog zombie that contained Sanji's shadow. He possessed Sanji's chivalry and fighting style but protected Nami.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Jigoro
description: A legendary samurai zombie that contained Zoro's shadow. He wielded three swords and constantly fought with Inuppe.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Ryuma
description: A legendary samurai from Wano turned into a zombie. He possessed Brook's shadow and gave Zoro the sword Shusui after being defeated.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Oars
description: A gigantic Ancient Giant zombie known as the 'Continent Puller'. He was animated by Luffy's shadow and served as the final boss of Thriller Bark.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Captain John
description: A famous pirate captain turned zombie general. He was formerly a member of the Rocks Pirates and left behind a legendary treasure sought by Buggy.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Lola (Zombie)
description: A warthog zombie that contained Charlotte Lola's shadow. She fell in love with Absalom and tried to marry him.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Risky Brothers
description: A pair of squirrel zombies on Thriller Bark. They are mischievous and are often seen together delivering news or transporting bodies.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Cerberus
description: A three-headed zombie dog guarding the entrance to Thriller Bark. One of its heads is actually a fox, which annoys it.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Tararan
description: A giant spider-monkey zombie that controlled the spider mice on Thriller Bark. He captured Robin and Franky but was defeated by Brook.

crew.name: Thriller Bark Pirates
crew.description: A zombie-themed crew led by Gecko Moria.

name: Gyro
description: A pirate captain from the South Blue known as 'Crab-Hand' Gyro. He was attacked by the New Fish-Man Pirates on his way to the New World.

crew.name: Gyro Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew decimated by the New Fish-Man Pirates.

name: Duval
description: The leader of the Rosy Life Riders (formerly Flying Fish Riders). He initially hated Sanji for having a bounty poster that looked exactly like him, but Sanji fixed his face.

crew.name: Rosy Life Riders
crew.description: A gang of kidnappers near Sabaody who turned into allies of the Straw Hats.

name: Motobaro
description: Duval's pet bison and mount. He is strong and loyal, helping Duval lead the Flying Fish Riders into battle.

crew.name: Rosy Life Riders
crew.description: A gang of kidnappers near Sabaody.

name: Shakuyaku
description: Known as 'Shakky', she is the owner of Shakky's Rip-Off Bar on Sabaody. A former pirate, Empress of Amazon Lily, and Rayleigh's partner.

crew.name: Sabaody Archipelago
crew.description: A massive mangrove forest serving as a stopover for pirates entering the New World.

name: Camie
description: A kissing gourami mermaid who dreams of becoming a fashion designer. She is a close friend of Hatchan and was kidnapped at Sabaody.

crew.name: Sabaody Archipelago
crew.description: A massive mangrove forest.

name: Pappag
description: A starfish who is Camie's pet and master. He is the designer of the popular Criminal fashion brand and believes he is human.

crew.name: Sabaody Archipelago
crew.description: A massive mangrove forest.

name: Disco
description: The manager of the Human Auction House on Sabaody Archipelago. He was a subordinate of Doflamingo but was abandoned after the auction incident.

crew.name: Donquixote Family
crew.description: A powerful pirate crew that ruled Dressrosa and the underworld.

name: Pascia
description: A young dancer who was put up for sale at the Human Auction House. She was listed as one of the 'Super Rookies' of slavery.

crew.name: Civilians
crew.description: Unaffiliated citizens.

name: Lacuba
description: A pirate captain known as a brilliant strategist. He tried to commit suicide at the Human Auction House to avoid slavery but was saved by Rayleigh.

crew.name: Civilians
crew.description: Unaffiliated citizens.

name: Devil Dias
description: The captain of the Acumate Pirates. He tried to escape slavery on Sabaody but was killed by his explosive collar.

crew.name: Acumate Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew whose captain was captured by slavers.

name: Macro
description: A Fish-Man kidnapper and former member of the Sun Pirates. He repeatedly tried to kidnap Camie to sell her but was thwarted by Hatchan.

crew.name: Macro Gang
crew.description: A group of kidnappers operating near Sabaody.

name: Tansui
description: A member of the Macro Gang. He is an Arowana Fish-Man who specializes in Fish-Man Karate and aids Macro in kidnapping.

crew.name: Macro Gang
crew.description: A group of kidnappers operating near Sabaody.

name: Gyararo
description: A member of the Macro Gang. He is a Popeye Goldfish Fish-Man who wields a sword and helps kidnap mermaids.

crew.name: Macro Gang
crew.description: A group of kidnappers operating near Sabaody.

name: Byron
description: A man from a family of musicians who was sold into slavery at the Sabaody Auction House. He was listed as a 'human shop commodity'.

crew.name: Civilians
crew.description: Unaffiliated citizens.

name: Peterman
description: The boss of the Hound Pets kidnapping gang on Sabaody. He kidnapped Camie to sell her at the auction house but was beaten by Duval.

crew.name: Hound Pets
crew.description: A kidnapping team operating on Sabaody Archipelago.

name: Sweet Pea
description: A warrior of the Kuja Tribe. She rescued Luffy when he first landed on Amazon Lily and is physically large and strong.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

name: Aphelandra
description: A warrior of the Kuja Tribe. She is exceptionally tall (over 2 meters) and helped rescue Luffy alongside Sweet Pea and Marguerite.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

name: Kikyo
description: A commander of the Kuja warriors. She is stern and strict, often scolding the other warriors for their curiosity about men.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

name: Nerine
description: A warrior of the Kuja Tribe. She is a shorter woman who takes diligent notes on everything she observes, especially regarding men.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

name: Ran
description: A pirate of the Kuja crew and a skilled warrior. She often acts as an advisor or voice of reason among the crew members.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

name: Rindo
description: A pirate of the Kuja crew. She is a sniper who uses a bazooka, embodying the Kuja's strength and skill with Haki.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

name: Gloriosa (Elder Nyon)
description: The former Empress of Amazon Lily. She lives in isolation and guides Boa Hancock, possessing wisdom about the outside world and 'Love Sickness'.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

name: Salome
description: Boa Hancock's pet snake weapon. It wears a skull helmet and can track people across the ocean or form a throne for Hancock.

crew.name: Kuja Pirates
crew.description: An all-female pirate crew from Amazon Lily.

name: Monkey D. Dragon
description: The Supreme Commander of the Revolutionary Army and the most wanted man in the world. He is Luffy's father and seeks to overthrow the World Government.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

name: Sabo
description: The Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army and sworn brother to Luffy and Ace. He inherited Ace's will by eating the Flame-Flame Fruit.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

fruit.name: Flame-Flame Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire.

name: Koala
description: An officer of the Revolutionary Army and Fish-Man Karate Assistant Instructor. She is a former slave who was freed by Fisher Tiger.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

name: Hack
description: An officer of the Revolutionary Army and a Japanese Soldierfish Fish-Man. He is a master of Fish-Man Karate and a close friend of Jinbe.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

name: Emporio Ivankov
description: The Commander of the G Army (Grand Line) and Queen of Kamabakka Kingdom. He uses the Horm-Horm Fruit to manipulate hormones and bodies.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

fruit.name: Horm-Horm Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create and control special hormones that can alter gender, body temperature, and more.

name: Inazuma
description: The Deputy Commander of the G Army under Ivankov. He can cut through solid objects like paper using the Snip-Snip Fruit.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

fruit.name: Snip-Snip Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform their body parts into scissors and cut through anything.

name: Morley
description: The Commander of the West Army. He is a giant newkama who can push the ground like clay using the Push-Push Fruit.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

fruit.name: Push-Push Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to push and mold the ground as if it were clay.

name: Belo Betty
description: The Commander of the East Army. She uses the Pump-Pump Fruit to encourage people and awaken their latent strength to fight.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

fruit.name: Pump-Pump Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to encourage people, boosting their physical strength and morale.

name: Lindbergh
description: The Commander of the South Army. He is a cat Mink and a brilliant inventor who creates various weapons and gadgets to fight the Government.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

name: Karasu
description: The Commander of the North Army. He can transform his body and clothes into a murder of crows using the Soot-Soot Fruit.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

fruit.name: Soot-Soot Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into soot.

name: Neptune
description: The King of the Ryugu Kingdom on Fish-Man Island. He is a Coelacanth Merman known as the 'God of the Sea' and was formerly a great knight.

crew.name: Ryugu Kingdom
crew.description: The underwater kingdom located 10,000 meters below sea level.

name: Otohime
description: The late Queen of the Ryugu Kingdom and a Goldfish Mermaid. She was a political activist who campaigned for friendship between humans and Fish-Men.

crew.name: Ryugu Kingdom
crew.description: The underwater kingdom located 10,000 meters below sea level.

name: Fukaboshi
description: The eldest prince of the Ryugu Kingdom. He is a Shark Merman and a strong warrior who leads the Neptune Army.

crew.name: Ryugu Kingdom
crew.description: The underwater kingdom located 10,000 meters below sea level.

name: Ryuboshi
description: The second prince of the Ryugu Kingdom. He is an Oarfish Merman who often sings his sentences and fights using swords.

crew.name: Ryugu Kingdom
crew.description: The underwater kingdom located 10,000 meters below sea level.

name: Manboshi
description: The third prince of the Ryugu Kingdom. He is an Opah Merman who enjoys dancing and singing.

crew.name: Ryugu Kingdom
crew.description: The underwater kingdom located 10,000 meters below sea level.

name: Shirahoshi
description: The Mermaid Princess of the Ryugu Kingdom. She is a giant Smelt-Whiting Mermaid and the current incarnation of the Ancient Weapon Poseidon.

crew.name: Ryugu Kingdom
crew.description: The underwater kingdom located 10,000 meters below sea level.

name: Megalo
description: Princess Shirahoshi's beloved pet shark. He famously hid Luffy inside his mouth to sneak him into the palace to meet the princess.

crew.name: Ryugu Kingdom
crew.description: The underwater kingdom located 10,000 meters below sea level.

name: Madam Shyarly
description: A Shortfin Mako Mermaid and owner of the Mermaid Cafe. She is a fortune teller who predicted that Luffy would destroy Fish-Man Island.

crew.name: Ryugu Kingdom
crew.description: The underwater kingdom located 10,000 meters below sea level.

name: Den
description: A Wolf-Eel Merman and the younger brother of Tom. He is a shipwright and sea forest researcher who helped Franky coat the Sunny.

crew.name: Ryugu Kingdom
crew.description: The underwater kingdom located 10,000 meters below sea level.

name: Caesar Clown
description: A mad scientist and former colleague of Vegapunk. He produces weapons of mass destruction and uses the Gas-Gas Fruit.

crew.name: Punk Hazard
crew.description: A forbidden island that was the site of the duel between Akainu and Aokiji.

fruit.name: Gas-Gas Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to turn into gas, float, and control the gases in the atmosphere.

name: Smiley
description: A giant slime pet created by Caesar Clown from condensed poison gas. It 'ate' the Axolotl fruit and was used to create the Shinokuni gas.

crew.name: Punk Hazard
crew.description: A forbidden island housing Caesar's lab.

fruit.name: Salamander-Salamander Fruit, Model: Axolotl
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform into an Axolotl. In this case, it animated a mass of poison gas.
fruit.roman_name: Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl

name: Rock (Yeti Cool Brothers)
description: One of the Yeti Cool Brothers, hitmen employed by Caesar Clown. They are giants covered in fur who use gas weapons.

crew.name: Punk Hazard
crew.description: A forbidden island housing Caesar's lab.

name: Scotch (Yeti Cool Brothers)
description: The other half of the Yeti Cool Brothers. He wears a gas mask and fights alongside his brother Rock in the snowy mountains.

crew.name: Punk Hazard
crew.description: A forbidden island housing Caesar's lab.

name: Kin'emon
description: The leader of the Red Scabbards and a samurai from Wano. He can generate clothing using his Devil Fruit and cuts fire with his 'Foxfire Style'.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Garb-Garb Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create clothing and disguises by placing a leaf or stone on a person's head.

name: Kozuki Momonosuke
description: The current Shogun of Wano and son of Oden. He ate an artificial Devil Fruit created by Vegapunk that turns him into a pink dragon.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Artificial Devil Fruit (Momo's)
fruit.description: A failure created by Vegapunk. It allows the user to transform into a pink dragon capable of creating flame clouds.

name: Kurozumi Kanjuro
description: A former Red Scabbard who was revealed to be a traitor from the Kurozumi clan. He can bring his drawings to life using the Brush-Brush Fruit.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Brush-Brush Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to bring anything they draw to life.

name: Raizo
description: A Red Scabbard and a ninja of the Wano Country. Known as 'Raizo of the Mist', he uses scroll-based ninjutsu stored in his Devil Fruit.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Scroll-Scroll Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create scrolls and store attacks or objects inside them.

name: Ashura Doji
description: A Red Scabbard and former bandit leader of Kuri. Also known as Shutenmaru, he is one of the strongest samurai in Wano.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Denjiro
description: A Red Scabbard who went undercover as the yakuza boss Kyoshiro. He protected Hiyori for 20 years while waiting for the prophecy.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Kikunojo
description: A Red Scabbard known as 'Kikunojo of the Lingering Snow'. She is Izou's younger sister and fights wearing a demon mask.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Kawamatsu
description: A Red Scabbard and a sumo-wrestling Kappa Fish-Man. He protected Hiyori for years and was imprisoned in Udon for 13 years.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Inuarashi
description: A Red Scabbard and one of the two rulers of Zou (Duke of Day). He is a dog Mink who once sailed with Roger and Whitebeard.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Nekomamushi
description: A Red Scabbard and one of the two rulers of Zou (Master of Night). He is a cat Mink who is fierce and once sailed with Roger.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Kozuki Oden
description: The Daimyo of Kuri and a legendary samurai who sailed with Whitebeard and Roger. He was executed by Kaido, saving his retainers in a boiling pot of oil.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Kozuki Toki
description: Oden's wife, who came from the Void Century using the Time-Time Fruit. She sent Momonosuke and others 20 years into the future.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Time-Time Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to send themselves and others forward in time.

name: Kozuki Hiyori
description: The daughter of Oden and sister of Momonosuke. She lived in disguise as the Oiran Komurasaki to survive under Orochi's rule.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Shinobu
description: A veteran kunoichi who supports the Kozuki Family. She uses the Ripe-Ripe Fruit to mature things (and people) rapidly.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Ripe-Ripe Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to mature and decay inanimate objects, or age living beings.

name: Hyogoro
description: The former yakuza boss of the Flower Capital, known as 'Hyogoro of the Flower'. He taught Luffy advanced Armament Haki in Udon.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Shimotsuki Yasuie
description: The former Daimyo of Hakumai who lived as 'Tonoyasu'. He sacrificed his life to save the rebellion's plans and provide a diversion.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Artificial Devil Fruit (Failed)
fruit.description: A defective SMILE fruit that took away his ability to express any emotion other than laughter.

name: Tama
description: A young kunoichi in training who befriended Ace and Luffy. Her Millet-Millet Fruit allows her to tame animals and SMILE users.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Millet-Millet Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create dumplings from their cheeks that can tame animals.

name: Toko
description: The adopted daughter of Yasuie and an attendant to Komurasaki. She accidentally ate a defective SMILE fruit, forcing her to laugh constantly.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Artificial Devil Fruit (Failed)
fruit.description: A defective SMILE fruit that prevents the user from showing emotions other than laughter.

name: Tenguyama Hitetsu
description: A swordsmith and descendant of the legendary Kotetsu. He lives in the ruins of Amigasa Village, guarding the Nidai Kitetsu sword and raising Tama.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Onimaru
description: A komainu-fox who was the companion of Shimotsuki Ushimaru. He guarded the graves of Ringo as the warrior monk Gyukimaru, stealing weapons to aid the rebellion.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Human-Human Fruit, Model: Onyudo
fruit.description: Allows the user (a fox) to transform into a large warrior monk (Onyudo).
fruit.roman_name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Onyudo

name: Tsunagoro
description: A former Yakuza boss of Hakumai known as 'Broken Hat'. He was imprisoned in Udon but joined the rebellion to fight Kaido.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: O-Cho
description: A former Yakuza boss of Ringo known as 'Moonflower'. She is a strict woman who joined Hyogoro in the raid on Onigashima.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: O-Masa
description: A former Yakuza boss of Udon known as 'Blood-Hair'. He has a distinctive large tongue and fought alongside the samurai alliance.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Yatappe
description: A former Yakuza boss of Kibi known as 'Snake-Eyes'. He wields a sword and supported the Kozuki restoration.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: O-Tsuru
description: The owner of a tea shop in Okobore Town and Kin'emon's wife. She remained faithful to him for 20 years, gathering information while he was time-traveling.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Pedro
description: A jaguar Mink and captain of the Guardians. He accompanied the Sanji Retrieval Team to Whole Cake Island and sacrificed his life to ensure their escape.

crew.name: Mink Tribe
crew.description: A tribe of animal-like humanoids living on the Phantom Island of Zou.

name: Carrot
description: A rabbit Mink and a King'sbird (ruler's aide). She stowed away on the Sunny to join the adventure and can transform into a powerful Sulong form under a full moon.

crew.name: Mink Tribe
crew.description: A tribe of animal-like humanoids living on the Phantom Island of Zou.

name: Wanda
description: A dog Mink and a member of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad. She wears Nami's clothes as a sign of friendship and is a skilled swordswoman.

crew.name: Mink Tribe
crew.description: A tribe of animal-like humanoids living on the Phantom Island of Zou.

name: Sicilian
description: A lion Mink and the captain of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad. He is extremely passionate, loud, and devoted to Duke Inuarashi.

crew.name: Mink Tribe
crew.description: A tribe of animal-like humanoids living on the Phantom Island of Zou.

name: Roddy
description: A bull Mink and a Guardian of the Whale Forest. He is physically strong and charges at intruders.

crew.name: Mink Tribe
crew.description: A tribe of animal-like humanoids living on the Phantom Island of Zou.

name: Blackback
description: A gorilla Mink and a Guardian of the Whale Forest. He has immense physical strength and protects the Poneglyph on Zou.

crew.name: Mink Tribe
crew.description: A tribe of animal-like humanoids living on the Phantom Island of Zou.

name: Miyagi
description: A goat Mink and a doctor on Zou. He helped treat the Minks after Jack's attack and is very knowledgeable.

crew.name: Mink Tribe
crew.description: A tribe of animal-like humanoids living on the Phantom Island of Zou.

name: Tristan
description: A squirrel Mink and a nurse on Zou. She assisted Chopper in treating the wounded Minks.

crew.name: Mink Tribe
crew.description: A tribe of animal-like humanoids living on the Phantom Island of Zou.

name: Bariete
description: A monkey Mink who serves as the gatekeeper of Zou. He alerts the tribe of incoming visitors or enemies by ringing the Bell of Welcome.

crew.name: Mink Tribe
crew.description: A tribe of animal-like humanoids living on the Phantom Island of Zou.

name: Zepo
description: A polar bear Mink and Bepo's older brother. He was a member of the Nox Pirates who died when Big Mom stole his lifespan.

crew.name: Mink Tribe
crew.description: A tribe of animal-like humanoids living on the Phantom Island of Zou.

name: Vinsmoke Judge
description: The King of the Germa Kingdom and patriarch of the Vinsmoke Family. Known as 'Garuda', he is a brilliant scientist who formerly worked with Vegapunk.

crew.name: Germa 66
crew.description: A Warmonger Kingdom and mercenary force composed of genetically modified humans.

name: Vinsmoke Reiju
description: The eldest daughter of the Vinsmoke Family, known as 'Poison Pink'. She has genetically enhanced poison abilities and is the only sibling who showed kindness to Sanji.

crew.name: Germa 66
crew.description: A mercenary force composed of genetically modified humans.

name: Vinsmoke Ichiji
description: The eldest son of the Vinsmoke Family, known as 'Sparking Red'. He lacks emotions and can project blasts of light energy.

crew.name: Germa 66
crew.description: A mercenary force composed of genetically modified humans.

name: Vinsmoke Niji
description: The second son of the Vinsmoke Family, known as 'Dengeki Blue'. He is arrogant and uses high-speed electrical attacks.

crew.name: Germa 66
crew.description: A mercenary force composed of genetically modified humans.

name: Vinsmoke Yonji
description: The fourth son of the Vinsmoke Family, known as 'Winch Green'. He possesses immense physical strength and an extendable mechanical arm.

crew.name: Germa 66
crew.description: A mercenary force composed of genetically modified humans.

name: Kurozumi Orochi
description: The cruel Shogun of Wano Country who allied with Kaido. He ate the Snake-Snake Fruit, Model: Yamata no Orochi, giving him eight heads.

crew.name: Orochi's Forces
crew.description: The samurai and ninja forces loyal to the usurper Shogun Orochi.

fruit.name: Snake-Snake Fruit, Model: Yamata no Orochi
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform into an eight-headed snake, granting them eight lives.
fruit.roman_name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Yamata no Orochi

name: Kurozumi Semimaru
description: A member of the Kurozumi clan and the previous user of the Barrier-Barrier Fruit. He protected Orochi during his rise to power.

crew.name: Orochi's Forces
crew.description: The forces loyal to Shogun Orochi.

fruit.name: Barrier-Barrier Fruit
fruit.description: Enables its user to generate almost invisible barriers to deflect or block any attack.

name: Kurozumi Higurashi
description: A member of the Kurozumi clan and the previous user of the Clone-Clone Fruit. She manipulated events to install Orochi as Shogun.

crew.name: Orochi's Forces
crew.description: The forces loyal to Shogun Orochi.

fruit.name: Clone-Clone Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to change their appearance to look like anyone whose face they have touched.

name: Crocus
description: The lighthouse keeper of the Twin Capes and the former doctor of the Roger Pirates. He oversees the whale Laboon and is a skilled doctor.

crew.name: Roger Pirates
crew.description: The legendary crew that conquered the Grand Line and found the One Piece.

name: Kyros
description: A legendary gladiator of the Corrida Colosseum who won 3000 matches. He was turned into a one-legged Toy Soldier by Sugar but fought to free Dressrosa.

crew.name: Dressrosa Royal Family
crew.description: The ruling family of the Kingdom of Passion, Dressrosa.

name: Rebecca
description: The granddaughter of King Riku and daughter of Kyros. She fought in the Colosseum as the 'Undefeated Woman' to win the Flame-Flame Fruit.

crew.name: Dressrosa Royal Family
crew.description: The ruling family of the Kingdom of Passion, Dressrosa.

name: Viola
description: The Princess of Dressrosa who was forced to join the Donquixote Family as 'Violet'. She uses the Glare-Glare Fruit to see through anything and read minds.

crew.name: Dressrosa Royal Family
crew.description: The ruling family of the Kingdom of Passion, Dressrosa.

fruit.name: Glare-Glare Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to see through solid objects, read minds, and see over vast distances.

name: Riku Dold III
description: The rightful King of Dressrosa who was framed by Doflamingo. He is a pacifist who refused to go to war, earning him the love of his people.

crew.name: Dressrosa Royal Family
crew.description: The ruling family of the Kingdom of Passion, Dressrosa.

name: Don Chinjao
description: The former leader of the Happo Navy and a legendary pirate with a bounty of over 500 million. He had a drill-shaped head that was flattened by Garp.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Kelly Funk
description: An assassin from the Mogaro Kingdom who fought in the Colosseum. He uses the Jacket-Jacket Fruit to be worn by his brother Bobby.

fruit.name: Jacket-Jacket Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to become a jacket that can be worn by others, controlling their body.

name: Bobby Funk
description: The younger brother of Kelly Funk. He is a pacifist with a massive, timid body, but possesses incredible durability. He wears Kelly to fight.

name: Jean Ango
description: A bounty hunter who infiltrates the Colosseum to collect weapons from defeated gladiators. He throws weapons with high precision.

name: King Elizabello II
description: The King of the Prodence Kingdom known as the 'Fighting King'. He possesses the devastating 'King Punch', rumored to be able to take down a Yonko.

name: Dagama
description: The tactician of the Prodence Kingdom. He schemed in the Colosseum to help King Elizabello II win by forming alliances and betraying them.

name: Tank Lepanto
description: The commander of the Riku Royal Army. He was forced to work for Doflamingo but remained loyal to King Riku.

crew.name: Dressrosa Royal Family
crew.description: The ruling family of the Kingdom of Passion, Dressrosa.

name: Fighting Bull
description: A bull nicknamed 'Ucy' by Luffy. It participated in the Corrida Colosseum and became Luffy's mount and friend.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Spartan
description: A gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum. He bullied other fighters but was easily defeated by Luffy before the tournament officially began.

name: Rolling Logan
description: A military commander from the South Kingdom who fought in the Colosseum. He uses grappling techniques to crush his opponents.

name: Mummy
description: A sorcerer from the New World who fought in the Colosseum. He has a creepy appearance and was defeated by Don Chinjao.

name: Damask
description: A pyromaniac who fought in the Colosseum. He wears a gas mask and uses fire-based attacks.

name: Acilia
description: A female gladiator in the Colosseum who fought alongside Rebecca. She acted as a shield to help Rebecca advance.

name: Meadows
description: A gladiator in the Colosseum who wears a leopard skin mask. He was actually one of the disguises used by the revolutionaries.

name: Gatz
description: The announcer of the Corrida Colosseum. He became a strong supporter of 'Lucy' (Luffy) and helped protect him while he recovered his Haki.

name: Aremo Ganmi
description: A gladiator in the Colosseum who fought in Block B. He was defeated during the battle royal.

name: Wicca
description: A dwarf of the Tontatta Tribe from the Scout Squad. She helped Zoro navigate Dressrosa and retrieve his sword.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Gancho
description: The Tontatta King (Tonta-Chief). He is Leo's superior and a kind leader who allied with the Straw Hats to fight Doflamingo.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Mansherry
description: The Princess of the Tontatta Tribe. She ate the Heal-Heal Fruit and can cure wounds with her tears. She is selfish but kind-hearted.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy.

fruit.name: Heal-Heal Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to heal living beings from injuries and diseases using their tears or dandelions.

name: Inhel
description: A member of the Tontatta Tribe. He is part of the aerial squad and uses a beetle to fly.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Yamato
description: The daughter of Kaido who identifies as Kozuki Oden. She possesses the Dog-Dog Fruit, Model: Okuchi-no-Makami, and fought alongside Luffy to free Wano.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

fruit.name: Dog-Dog Fruit, Model: Okuchi-no-Makami
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform into a mythical wolf deity, granting ice powers.
fruit.roman_name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Okuchi-no-Makami

name: Dr. Vegapunk (Stella)
description: The greatest scientist in the world who heads the SSG. He split his personality into six satellites to increase his productivity.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

fruit.name: Brain-Brain Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to store unlimited amounts of knowledge, causing their brain to grow indefinitely.

name: Shaka (Punk-01)
description: One of Vegapunk's six satellites, representing 'Good'. He wears a futuristic helmet and is the most logical of the group.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

name: Lilith (Punk-02)
description: One of Vegapunk's six satellites, representing 'Evil'. She is reckless, aggressive, and handles the funding (often by robbing pirates).

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

name: Edison (Punk-03)
description: One of Vegapunk's six satellites, representing 'Thinking'. He is a small robot who generates new ideas.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

name: Pythagoras (Punk-04)
description: One of Vegapunk's six satellites, representing 'Wisdom'. He is a robot who compiles data and analyzes information.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

name: Atlas (Punk-05)
description: One of Vegapunk's six satellites, representing 'Violence'. She is a large girl who uses holographic equipment to punch things.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

name: York (Punk-06)
description: One of Vegapunk's six satellites, representing 'Greed'. She eats, sleeps, and expels waste for the other satellites.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

name: S-Snake
description: A Seraphim clone of Boa Hancock created by Vegapunk. She possesses the Love-Love Fruit (via Green Blood) and Lunarian traits.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

fruit.name: Love-Love Fruit (Green Blood)
fruit.description: Replicated power that allows the user to petrify those who find them cute.

name: S-Hawk
description: A Seraphim clone of Dracule Mihawk created by Vegapunk. He possesses the Dice-Dice Fruit (via Green Blood) and is a master swordsman.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

fruit.name: Dice-Dice Fruit (Green Blood)
fruit.description: Replicated power that allows the user to turn their body into blades.

name: S-Bear
description: A Seraphim clone of Bartholomew Kuma created by Vegapunk. He possesses the Paw-Paw Fruit (via Green Blood).

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

fruit.name: Paw-Paw Fruit (Green Blood)
fruit.description: Replicated power that allows the user to repel anything they touch.

name: S-Shark
description: A Seraphim clone of Jinbe created by Vegapunk. He possesses the Swim-Swim Fruit (via Green Blood) and uses Fish-Man Karate.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

fruit.name: Swim-Swim Fruit (Green Blood)
fruit.description: Replicated power that allows the user to swim through solid surfaces.

name: Bartholomew Kuma
description: A former Warlord, Revolutionary Army officer, and King of the Sorbet Kingdom. He ate the Paw-Paw Fruit and allowed himself to be turned into a cyborg Pacifista.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

fruit.name: Paw-Paw Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to repel anything they touch, including air, pain, and fatigue.

name: Prince Grus
description: A Rear Admiral of the Marines and a member of SWORD. He uses the Clay-Clay Fruit to create and control clay soldiers.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

fruit.name: Clay-Clay Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to create and manipulate clay.

name: Kujaku
description: A Rear Admiral of the Marines, member of SWORD, and granddaughter of Tsuru. She uses the Whip-Whip Fruit to command anything she whips.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

fruit.name: Whip-Whip Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to command inanimate objects or living beings by whipping them.

name: Hibari
description: A Commander of the Marines and a member of SWORD. She is a skilled sniper who uses Vegapunk's GP Flower bullets.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

name: Bogard
description: A Marine officer and the right-hand man of Monkey D. Garp. He is a master swordsman who has served alongside Garp for decades.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

name: Morgan
description: A former Marine Captain known as 'Axe-Hand Morgan'. He was the first major Marine antagonist defeated by Luffy and is Helmeppo's father.

name: Zunesha
description: A Naitamie-Norida elephant that has wandered the New World for 1,000 years. It carries the island of Zou on its back as punishment for a past crime.

name: Komachiyo
description: A komainu (guardian dog) native to Wano Country. He was tamed by Tama and serves as a loyal mount and fighter.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Hihimaru
description: A baboon native to Wano Country. He was a sword-wielding bandit beast until Tama tamed him with her devil fruit power.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Cotton
description: A dwarf of the Tontatta Tribe. She uses a flintlock rifle and serves in the Tontatta Pirates.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Baxcon
description: A dwarf of the Tontatta Tribe. He is a warrior who fought against the Donquixote Family.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Daikon
description: A dwarf of the Tontatta Tribe. He is a stout warrior who participated in the Dressrosa revolution.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Chao
description: A dwarf of the Tontatta Tribe. He is known for his large sunglasses and fighting spirit.

crew.name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
crew.description: An alliance of seven powerful pirate crews that pledged loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Ahiru
description: The Deputy Commander of the East Army of the Revolutionary Army. She has a mechanical left arm.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

name: Gaburu
description: The Deputy Commander of the South Army of the Revolutionary Army. He uses his breath to inflate his body for combat.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

name: Jiron
description: The Deputy Commander of the North Army of the Revolutionary Army. He wears goggles and has a gambling theme.

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

name: Ushimaru Shimotsuki
description: The former Daimyo of Ringo in Wano Country. He was a master swordsman and a descendant of Ryuma, bearing a striking resemblance to Zoro.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Fugetsu Omusubi
description: The former Daimyo of Kibi in Wano Country. He had a triangular head and refused to serve Orochi and Kaido.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Uzuki Tempura
description: The former Daimyo of Udon in Wano Country. He fought alongside the other Daimyo against Kaido after Oden's death.

crew.name: Wano Alliance
crew.description: The alliance of Samurai, Minks, and Pirates fighting to free Wano.

name: Mr. 7 (New)
description: A sniper for Baroque Works who replaced the previous Mr. 7. He fought against Vivi in the clock tower.

crew.name: Baroque Works
crew.description: A secret criminal syndicate led by Crocodile.

name: Miss Father's Day
description: The partner of the new Mr. 7 in Baroque Works. She dresses in a frog costume and uses a gun.

crew.name: Baroque Works
crew.description: A secret criminal syndicate led by Crocodile.

name: Mr. 13
description: A sea otter who is part of 'The Unluckies' of Baroque Works. He draws portraits of targets and attacks with sharp shells.

crew.name: Baroque Works
crew.description: A secret criminal syndicate led by Crocodile.

name: Miss Friday
description: A vulture who is part of 'The Unluckies' of Baroque Works. She serves as the mount for Mr. 13 and executes failed agents.

crew.name: Baroque Works
crew.description: A secret criminal syndicate led by Crocodile.

name: Mohmoo
description: A giant Sea Cow originally used by the Arlong Pirates. Later, he was forced to pull the Caribou Pirates' ship.

crew.name: Arlong Pirates
crew.description: A Fish-Man pirate crew led by Arlong.

name: Lapahn
description: Giant carnivorous rabbits native to Drum Island. They are intelligent and aggressive, but can be loyal if earned.

crew.name: Sakura Kingdom
crew.description: The winter island famous for its advanced medicine and cherry blossom snow.

name: Hiking Bear
description: A bear on Drum Island that walks upright on two legs. It politely bows to travelers if they bow first.

crew.name: Sakura Kingdom
crew.description: The winter island famous for its advanced medicine.

name: Tensei (Kurouma)
description: The Vice Admiral and Director of the Marine Criminal Investigative Service. He is often seen discussing world events with Akainu.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

name: Doll
description: A Vice Admiral of the Marines stationed at the G-14 base near Egghead. She commanded the forces during the Egghead Incident.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

name: Bluegrass
description: A Vice Admiral of the Marines. She is an elderly woman who uses the Ride-Ride Fruit to control any machine or creature she mounts.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

fruit.name: Ride-Ride Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to ride and control anything they mount, including machines and Pacifistas.

name: Red King
description: A Vice Admiral of the Marines. He has a mechanical arm and participated in the Buster Call on Egghead Island.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

name: Joseph
description: A masked agent of CP0. He was present in Dressrosa and Wano, observing the events and reporting to the World Government.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Gismonda
description: A masked agent of CP0. He has a tall, slender build and accompanied the other agents during the Reverie and Wano.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Laskey
description: A former CP9 agent and Kalifa's father. He participated in the Ohara Buster Call 20 years ago.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The secret intelligence agencies of the World Government.

name: Ginny
description: A former commander of the East Army of the Revolutionary Army. She was a slave at God Valley and Kuma's close friend and eventual wife (implied mother of Bonney).

crew.name: Revolutionary Army
crew.description: A powerful military organization fighting against the World Government.

name: S-Crocodile
description: A Seraphim clone of Sir Crocodile created by Vegapunk. He possesses the Sand-Sand Fruit (via Green Blood) and attacks with precision.

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

fruit.name: Sand-Sand Fruit (Green Blood)
fruit.description: Replicated power that allows the user to turn into and manipulate sand.

name: S-Flamingo
description: A Seraphim clone of Donquixote Doflamingo created by Vegapunk. He possesses the String-String Fruit (via Green Blood).

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

fruit.name: String-String Fruit (Green Blood)
fruit.description: Replicated power that allows the user to manipulate strings.

name: S-Bat
description: A Seraphim clone of Gecko Moria created by Vegapunk. He possesses the Shadow-Shadow Fruit (via Green Blood).

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

fruit.name: Shadow-Shadow Fruit (Green Blood)
fruit.description: Replicated power that allows the user to manipulate shadows.

name: Chessmarimo
description: A fusion of Wapol's officers Chess and Kuromarimo created by Wapol's Munch-Munch Fruit. They have four arms and two heads.

crew.name: Black Drum Kingdom
crew.description: A kingdom established by Wapol in the South Blue.

name: Dorry
description: One of the two captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates from Elbaf. He has fought Brogy on Little Garden for 100 years. Known as the 'Blue Ogre'.

crew.name: Giant Warrior Pirates
crew.description: The legendary crew of giants from Elbaf, feared throughout the world.

name: Brogy
description: One of the two captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates from Elbaf. He has fought Dorry on Little Garden for 100 years. Known as the 'Red Ogre'.

crew.name: Giant Warrior Pirates
crew.description: The legendary crew of giants from Elbaf.

name: Oimo
description: A giant from Elbaf who guarded the main gate of Enies Lobby for 50 years. He was tricked by the World Government but later rejoined the Giant Warrior Pirates.

crew.name: Giant Warrior Pirates
crew.description: The legendary crew of giants from Elbaf.

name: Kashi
description: A giant from Elbaf who guarded the main gate of Enies Lobby alongside Oimo. He rejoined the Giant Warrior Pirates after learning the truth.

crew.name: Giant Warrior Pirates
crew.description: The legendary crew of giants from Elbaf.

name: Jarul
description: One of the former captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates and a hero of Elbaf. Known as 'Mountain Beard', he was one of the oldest giants.

crew.name: Elbaf
crew.description: The Kingdom of Giants.

name: Jorul
description: One of the former captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates and a hero of Elbaf. Known as 'Waterfall Beard', he was killed by a young Charlotte Linlin.

crew.name: Elbaf
crew.description: The Kingdom of Giants.

name: Saint Figarland Garling
description: The Supreme Commander of the God Knights and a Celestial Dragon. He is a former champion of God Valley and possesses immense authority.

crew.name: God Knights
crew.description: The elite law enforcement group of Mariejois that polices the Celestial Dragons.

name: Kong
description: The Commander-in-Chief of the World Government and former Fleet Admiral. He oversees the Marines, Cipher Pol, and the Seven Warlords (formerly).

crew.name: World Government
crew.description: The political organization that rules the world.

name: Wadatsumi
description: A giant Tiger Blowfish Fish-Man known as 'Large Monk'. He was a subordinate of Vander Decken IX but later joined the Sun Pirates.

crew.name: Sun Pirates
crew.description: A legendary crew formed by Fisher Tiger to free slaves and protect Fish-Men.

name: Surume
description: A giant Kraken from the North Pole. It was tamed by Luffy on the way to Fish-Man Island and helped protect the Sunny.

crew.name: Civilians / Wild
crew.description: Unaffiliated entities.

name: Laboon
description: An Island Whale living at the Twin Capes. He has waited 50 years for the return of the Rumbar Pirates (Brook).

crew.name: Civilians / Wild
crew.description: Unaffiliated entities.

name: Bellamy
description: The captain of the Bellamy Pirates, known as 'The Hyena'. He uses the Spring-Spring Fruit. He retired from piracy to become a dyer after Dressrosa.

crew.name: Bellamy Pirates
crew.description: A pirate crew formerly affiliated with Doflamingo.

fruit.name: Spring-Spring Fruit
fruit.description: Allows the user to transform their limbs into springs, granting high jumping power and striking force.

name: Yarisugi
description: A Commodore of the G-5 Marine Base. He has a cruel personality and wears boots that look like car tires.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

name: Ripper
description: A Marine Commander at the 153rd Branch. He took command after Morgan's defeat and allowed Luffy and Zoro to escape.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

name: Ukkari
description: A Marine Lieutenant who accidentally damaged a statue of Morgan, leading to his near execution.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

name: Rokkaku
description: A Marine Lieutenant under Morgan. He refused orders to kill a little girl (Rika) and was attacked by Morgan for it.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

name: Holy
description: A giant dog owned by Ohm, one of Enel's priests. It is trained to walk on two legs and knows martial arts.

crew.name: God's Army
crew.description: The army led by Enel.

name: Fuza
description: A giant bird ridden by Shura, one of Enel's priests. It can breathe fire due to a Flame Dial in its mouth.

crew.name: God's Army
crew.description: The army led by Enel.

name: Su
description: A cloud fox owned by Conis in Skypiea. She is intelligent and loyal.

crew.name: Skypiea
crew.description: A land in the sky.

name: Hoe
description: King Neptune's beloved pet whale. It wears a crown and carries Neptune around Fish-Man Island.

crew.name: Ryugu Kingdom
crew.description: The underwater kingdom located 10,000 meters below sea level.

name: Sengoku's Goat
description: The pet goat of former Fleet Admiral Sengoku. It is often seen eating important documents.

crew.name: Marines
crew.description: The sea military force of the World Government.

name: Stefan
description: The pet dog of Edward Newgate (Whitebeard). It has a mustache similar to Whitebeard's.

crew.name: Whitebeard Pirates
crew.description: A mighty pirate crew led by Edward Newgate.
